title: LF Master/Challenger MID or JG for LAN FINALS in MELBOURNE. Prize money guaranteed.
body:
LF Master/Challenger MID or JG lane to play in the finals of a MELBOURNE lan tournament. 

We have played in 2 of the 3 stages our team is in the grand final with guaranteed prize money. Due to unfortunate circumstances our current mid laner will be unable to fly down to play in it. 

Requirements:

Minimum 2 bo3 games on the day of the final.
Positive attitude
Able to scrim every night leading up to the final (scrims have already been organized)
That's it!

Add me for further info

IGN: 

Hyper bluz0r
